title: How to Make Vada Pav (Mumbai)

steps.headline: Boil and mash the potatoes and keep aside.
When they start spluttering, add curry leaves, chopped chillies and onions.
When the onions turn brown, add salt and turmeric, and then add the potato.
Mix well and add very little water.
When the mixture turns cold, divide the mixture into 20 portions and roll into balls.
In a separate bowl, mix together the gram flour, salt, crushed garlic and soda bicarb.
steps.description: Add water to make a thick batter.

steps.headline: Now dip the potato balls in this batter and deep fry them.
Serve vada in a pav, garnished liberally with hot garlic chutney and a sweet sauce.

text: Boil and mash the potatoes and keep aside.  Heat the oil. Add mustard  seeds. When they start spluttering, add curry leaves, chopped chillies and onions.  When the onions turn brown, add salt and turmeric, and then add the potato.  Mix well and add very little water. Remove from heat once done. When the mixture turns cold, divide the mixture into 20 portions and roll into balls.  In a separate bowl, mix together the gram flour, salt, crushed garlic and soda bicarb. Add water to make a thick batter. Now dip the potato balls in this batter and deep fry them.  Serve vada in a pav, garnished liberally with hot garlic chutney and a sweet sauce.
